item.description:
Join Us in Our 26.2 Mile Fight to Cure Cancer
We want to celebrate running 26.2 and raise money for Dana Farber Cancer Research.

Come and enjoy a night out for a good cause. Interested in Bruins tickets, Celtics tickets, a Red Sox autographed baseball, massages, gift cards to great local restaurants? All will be given out as part of our silent auction. The night will also feature an awesome local band The Off Chance (http://theoffchance.com/) performing live.

There is a suggested donation of $20 and cash bar. We also take pennies, nickles, dimes and quarters. No donation is too small. Bring your cash and checkbook! Please feel free to donate as part of the silent auction.
item.name: A cancer kickin Party
